p: The age range of the animals was between 6 months and 5 years. MERS-CoV RNA detection was pronounced between those older than 1 year and up to age 2 years (χ 2 test p<0·0001). This difference was significant for both the imported and local cohorts in which samples from all the different age groups were available—ie, Sudan (χ 2 test p<0·0001) and Jeddah (χ 2 test p<0·0035; table).
